title: Wallet - VirtualizedList for coins
body:
# Bug Report

## Problem

When you go to the **wallet** tab, the following error pops up in the metro console with:

```
VirtualizedLists should never be nested inside plain ScrollViews with the same orientation - use another VirtualizedList-backed container instead.
    in Context.Consumer (at VirtualizedList.js:1137)
    in VirtualizedList (at FlatList.js:633)
    in FlatList (created by status_im.ui.components.list.views.flat_list)
    in status_im.ui.components.list.views.flat_list (created by assets)
    in assets (created by status_im.ui.screens.wallet.accounts.views.assets)
    in status_im.ui.screens.wallet.accounts.views.assets (created by quo.components.animated_header.header_container)
    in quo.components.animated_header.header_container (created by reagent18)
    in reagent18 (created by Context.Consumer)
    in Context.Consumer (created by quo.components.safe_area.consumer)
    in quo.components.safe_area.consumer (created by quo.components.animated_header.header)
    in quo.components.animated_header.header (created by status_im.ui.screens.wallet.accounts.views.accounts_overview)
    in status_im.ui.screens.wallet.accounts.views.accounts_overview (created by Context.Consumer)
    in Context.Consumer (created by Anonymous)
    in Anonymous (at SceneView.tsx:112)
    in SceneView (at useDescriptors.tsx:150)
    in CardContainer (at CardStack.tsx:552)
    in Context.Consumer (at CardStack.tsx:405)
    in CardStack (at StackView.tsx:437)
    in KeyboardManager (at StackView.tsx:435)
    in Context.Consumer (at SafeAreaContext.tsx:117)
    in SafeAreaConsumer (at StackView.tsx:433)
    in StackView (at createStackNavigator.tsx:82)
    in StackNavigator (created by reagent17)
    in reagent17 (created by status_im.ui.screens.routing.wallet_stack.wallet_stack)
    in status_im.ui.screens.routing.wallet_stack.wallet_stack (created by Context.Consumer)
    in Context.Consumer (created by Anonymous)
    in Anonymous (at SceneView.tsx:112)
    in SceneView (at useDescriptors.tsx:150)
    in BottomTabView (at createBottomTabNavigator.tsx:41)
    in BottomTabNavigator (created by reagent12)
    in reagent12 (created by status_im.ui.screens.routing.main.tabs)
    in status_im.ui.screens.routing.main.tabs (created by Context.Consumer)
    in Context.Consumer (created by Anonymous)
    in Anonymous (at SceneView.tsx:112)
    in SceneView (at useDescriptors.tsx:150)
    in CardContainer (at CardStack.tsx:552)
    in Context.Consumer (at CardStack.tsx:405)
    in CardStack (at StackView.tsx:437)
    in KeyboardManager (at StackView.tsx:435)
    in Context.Consumer (at SafeAreaContext.tsx:117)
    in SafeAreaConsumer (at StackView.tsx:433)
    in StackView (at createStackNavigator.tsx:82)
    in StackNavigator (created by reagent2)
    in reagent2 (created by get-main-component)
    in get-main-component (created by G__33520)
    in G__33520 (created by reagent1)
    in reagent1 (created by root)
    in root (created by status_im.core.root)
    in status_im.core.root (at renderApplication.js:45)
```
#### Expected behavior

Some other view component should be used instead, to prevent this error from showing up.
Possibly switching away from ScrollView to FlatList.

### Reproduction

The same as the problem definition.

### Additional Information

- Status version: 1.5.0
- Operating System: iOS
I'm not sure it is relevant anymore in terms of redesign app. Reopen if it is still important
